abstract: The effort, which will unfold over three years, includes unspecified donations to nonprofit organizations that provide support for those returning from Iraq and Afghanistan as they transition to civilian life.
snippet: The effort, which will unfold over three years, includes unspecified donations to nonprofit organizations that provide support for those returning from Iraq and Afghanistan as they transition to civilian life.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The Walt Disney Company’s senior executives decamped to Kansas City, Mo., on Tuesday to conduct their annual meeting for shareholders and made sure as always to bring a piece of positive news: Heroes Work Here.

headline.main: At Shareholder Meeting, Disney Commits to Hire 1,000 Veterans
